charges.charge_description: CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 months custody of the Bureau of Prisons, 5 years Supervised Release Term, $100 Special Assessment, $1,800 fine. 3/18/2013 Continued on supervised with all previous conditions re-imposed. 8/15/2014 Time served, re-imposed supervised release term until the original expiration date, with special conditions participate for the next six (6) months in home confinement with monitoring at the discretion of the probation officer and no alcohol consumption for one (1) year; all other previous conditions are re-imposed. 10/9/2015 Ninety (90) days custody of the Bureau of Prisons, re-imposed supervised release term until the original expiration date, under all the previous conditions except for any that were previously satisfied, with additional special condition that he participate in electronic monitoring with a curfew from 9:00 PM to 5:00 AM for six (6) months following his release from confinement. 10/6/2017 Ninety (90) days-credit to time served and no further supervised release term.
